summary: This document contains a series of Fedwire credit and debit advice transactions involving Southern Trust Company Inc. and various banks, primarily Deutsche Bank and FirstBank Puerto Rico. The transactions detail significant monetary transfers, including amounts received and debited, along with associated fees.

keyFacts: The document details multiple financial transactions involving Southern Trust Company Inc. and various banks.
IMAD is consistently listed as the beneficiary in numerous transactions.
Darren K Indyke, Richard Kahn, and Erika A Kellerhals are identified as originators of significant transactions.
The transactions include large sums, with one notable credit of $5,566,408.92 on November 20, 2019.
Several transactions on December 12, 2019, total over $10 million, indicating substantial financial activity.
